reference_template: Author, A. A. (Year, Month Day). Title of article. *Name of Newspaper*. URL
template_explanation: Newspaper articles include the full date, newspaper name in italics, and direct URL. Author format follows standard APA rules.
common_rules: Include full publication date (Year, Month Day)
Article title uses sentence case (not title case)
Include direct URL to the article
key_validation_points: Author names in Last, F. format
Date in parentheses with full date
